page.title: 01Overall View of Block
page.content: This block is just to the East of Bristol and North West of Bath. It fits into the valley of the{River {Boyd}which flows southwards to the {River Avon. The highest point of the block is 100 metres above sea level. It is on the side of{Freezing Hill}which is part of the{Cotswold Hills.}The lowest point in the block is about 25 metres above sea level, on the banks of the {River Boyd. The block covers a rural area.It has one village, Wick, which has a quarry and a plastics factory in it. Near the village there is the Country Club and Golf Course called Tracy Park.
